dict.string: You are a colourful thinker and you like things that fascinate you. You have a mind of your own but the beauty of everyday doesn’t fail to leave you in wonder. Music makes you happy and you just can’t resist tapping your toes to the tune.

You are an out-of-the-box thinker. No matter what the problem, you always have a solution and you don’t like to stick to the rulebook. Be it a new gadget or an inventive new toy in town, you will want to get your hands on it.

You like to work for what you have and you’re satisfied with it. You may be a simple person but you’ve got impeccable taste. You always set clear goals in life and get there through endurance and perseverance. Whatever comes your way, you know you’ll deal with it head on.

There’s no place like the top and you want to get there. You set your sights high in whatever you do. Be it a work project or chilling with friends, you still like to lead the bandwagon. And it’s a good thing too because you are an exceptional leader.

Family and friends are always your first priority. You feel like love and togetherness makes for some of the best times and you like to take everyone along for the ride. You like big families and probably want a huge one of your own.

No matter how wild and crazy the world gets, you’re the anchor for your loved ones. When someone needs a safe haven they turn to you. You protect the people you love and would never let anyone or anything hurt them.

Whenever someone needs advice in life, they turn to you. Everyone knows that they can trust you with anything. Sometimes, people who don’t know you may think you are boring. But on the contrary, you’re the backbone of every party.
